Overview
Analysis

Welcome to TmS Correlates Exploration

This website provides visualizations to explore the genomic and clinical features that correlate with TmS for both TCGA, EOPC (early-onset prostate cancer) and METABRIC (Molecular Taxonomy of Breast Cancer International Consortium). It has the following functions:

  1. Interactively explore the correlations between the expression of a single gene and TmS within each cancer type.
  2. The correlations between Hallmark pathways and intrinsic tumor signature genes in across TCGA cancers.
  3. The correlations between KEGG pathways and intrinsic tumor signature genes in across TCGA cancers.
  4. TmS refines prognostication on pathological stages.

Explore pan-cancer correlates with TmS

Select a data cohort to start.

Developed by Shuangxi Ji.

Site built with pkgdown 1.6.1.
